name: Stickman Maverick : Bad Boys Killer
description: This game is just a huge destruction game. If you are good enough, you will kill thousand of stickman. Kill, kill, kill. What a pure pleasure ! What a unique enjoyment !!! Yeah Baby ! it"s raining bullets !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or equivalent Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: 2.4 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 500 series or higher Storage: 200 MB available space
